title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Infrastructures in Lebanon: A Detailed Account of Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Terror infrastructure and a military structure in which Hezbollah terrorists were operating; combat planes attacked in Lebanon region.

A short time ago, combat planes attacked several terror infrastructures of the terror organization Hezbollah in the Lebanon region and a military structure in the Kfar Kila region, in which the organization’s terrorists were operating. In addition, an IDF force attacked with tank fire to remove a threat in Aita ash-Shab.

Also, last night (Thursday) combat planes attacked the military structure of the terror organization Hezbollah in Bleyda alongside other areas in Lebanon.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3wsv8B8
